{{also|salat|Salat|sälät|sālāt|Sâlat}} ==German== ===Etymology 1=== From {{inh|de|gmh|salāt}}, from earlier {{der|de|it|salata}}, a variant of {{m|it|insalata}}. ====Pronunciation==== * {{IPA|de|/zaˈlaːt/}} * {{audio|de|De-Salat.ogg|audio}} * {{rhymes|de|aːt}} ====Noun==== {{de-noun|m|Salats|gen2=Salates|Salate|Salätchen}} # [[salad]] {{gloss|mixed, usually cold dish}} # [[lettuce]] and related [[leaf vegetable]]s =====Declension===== {{de-decl-noun-m|(e)s|e}} =====Synonyms===== * {{sense|lettuce}} {{l|de|Lattich}} =====Derived terms===== {{der3|de |Artischockensalat |Bandsalat |Bohnensalat |Buchstabensalat |Eiersalat |Eissalat |Eisbergsalat |Endiviensalat |Fleischsalat |Fruchtsalat |Italienischer Salat |Karottensalat |Kartoffelsalat |Kopfsalat |Kürbissalat |Möhrensalat |Nizzasalat |Nudelsalat |Obstsalat |Paprikasalat |Rucolasalat |Russischer Salat |Salatteller |Silbensalat |Tomatensalat |Waldorfsalat |Wortsalat |Zichoriensalat |Zuckerhutsalat }} ===Etymology 2=== From {{bor|de|ar|صَلَاة}}. ====Alternative forms==== * {{l|de|Salah}} ====Pronunciation==== * {{IPA|de|/saˈlaːt/}} ====Noun==== {{de-noun|f|g2=n|Salat|gen2=Salats|Salats|pl2=Salawat}} # {{lb|de|religion|Islam}} [[obligatory prayer]]; [[salat]] =====Synonyms===== * ({{l|de|islamisches}}) {{l|de|Pflichtgebet}} {{q|commoner}} [[Category:de:Vegetables]]
